Package org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class CrosshairPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.AbstractPlugin
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.CharbaPlugin<CrosshairOptions>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.CrosshairPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin
    final class CrosshairPlugin
extends CharbaPlugin<CrosshairOptions>
    This plugin is drawing horizontal and vertical crosshair on the chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  CrosshairPlugin.Point
      Internal object to have the percentage or point of the event point related to the scales.
      private static class  CrosshairPlugin.State
      Internal object to maintain the instances needed to draw the crosshair by every chart instance.

      • onBeforeUpdate

        public boolean onBeforeUpdate​(IsChart chart,
                              PluginUpdateArgument argument)
        Description copied from interface: Plugin
        Called before updating 'chart'.
        If any plugin returns false, the update is cancelled (and thus subsequent render(s)) until another 'update' is triggered.
        Parameters:
        chart - the chart instance.
        argument - the argument passed for update
        Returns:
        false to cancel the chart update.

      • onAfterDraw

        Parameters:
        chart - the chart instance.

      • mustBeActivated

        private boolean mustBeActivated​(IsChart chart,
                                boolean options)
        Returns true if the chart is consistent and the scale type is ScaleType.MULTI.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance to check
        options - if true, the method checks also the consistency o fthe options
        Returns:
        true if the chart is consistent and the scale type is ScaleType.MULTI

      • checkEvent

        private boolean checkEvent​(ChartEventContext context,
                           CrosshairOptions options)
        Checks if the event is consistent and the ModifierKey has been set in order to check if the event must be managed.
        Parameters:
        context - event context to check
        options - plugin options
        Returns:
        true if the event is consistent and the ModifierKey has been set in order to check if the event must be managed

        Parameters:
        width - line width to check
        color - color of the line to check
        Returns:
        true if the line can be drawn, width greater than 0 and color not transparent

      • inXScaleRange

        private boolean inXScaleRange​(ScaleItem scale,
                              IsPoint context)
        Returns true if the event is on X scale range. Needed for stacked scales.
        Parameters:
        scale - scale instance
        context - event context to check
        Returns:
        true if the event is on X scale range. Needed for stacked scales.

        Returns:

        private CrosshairPlugin.Point getPercentage​(IsPoint point,
                                            IsChart chart)
        Calculates the percentage of the event against the chart area.
        Parameters:
        point - event point
        chart - chart instance
        Returns:
        a point where x and y are percentages on chart area
